Session 1.SessionName: Introduction to Machine Learning and Python
Session 1.SessionDesc: Why And How You Will Learn Machine Learning.

Session 2.SessionDesc: Learn the essential libraries required to compute complex mathematical operations and plot data on code-generated graphs.

Session 3.SessionDesc: Learn the mathematics behind linear regression

Session 4.SessionDesc: Get to know how to practically implement linear regression and use it in a wide range of situations.

Session 5.SessionDesc: Dive deeper into the art of machine learning, and how to operate code that can classify elements using ML models

Session 6.SessionDesc: Model evaluation is crucial in machine learning to assess how well a trained model performs on unseen data.
